subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical city was founded by Rao Jodha and serves as the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की संस्कृतिपूर्वक नामक शहर राव जोधा के लिए बनाया गया है और यहां राजस्थान की राजधानी है।
explanation_en:
Jodhpur, also known as Meera, was founded by Rao Jodha and is the capital city of Rajasthan.
Jaipur, Ajmer, and Udaipur are other significant cities in Rajasthan, but Jodhpur is the one founded by Rao Jodha.
